body:
Corrupt a wish!

The rules are simple.

Corrupt the persons wish above you

Make a wish of your own.

A corruption would be liek dis

"I want a genie that gives me infinite wishes!"
Next guy:
"Wish granted, but the genie dies of old age."
"I wish for a coke."

So on. I'll begin.

I wish for a giant squid army.

title: Corrupt That Wish!

replies.body:
The squids are all mini Hellen Kellers.

I wish DoctaPop had potatoes for hands.
